DISCLAIMER:
 This software is provided free of charge and can be an invaluable tool track match time, yellow cards and penalties.
 
Any software has the potential to crash, so don't rely on this to keep score and ALWAYS wear a backup watch to save embarrassment!
 
 INSTRUCTIONS:
 * Connect your smart watch to the phone via bluetooth and select half lengths and team colours below.

 * Click match time to start/stop all timers.

 * Long pressing the match time will give you an option to start the next period, restart match or exit the app.

 * Long pressing the penalty counters will reverse the count.
